verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H4318>Micah<s%> the <S%H4183>Morasthite<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> and <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H2372>saw<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H7181>listen,<s%> O <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H4393>all<s%> that <S%H4393>therein<s%> is: and let the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> be <S%H5707>witness<s%> against you, the <S%H136>LORD<s%> from his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

For, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>comes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of his <S%H4725>place,<s%> and will <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H1869>tread<s%> on the <S%H1116>high<s%> places of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall be <S%H4549>molten<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> him, and the <S%H6010>valleys<s%> shall be <S%H1234>cleft,<s%> as <S%H1749>wax<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and as the <S%H4325>waters<s%> that are <S%H5064>poured<s%> down a <S%H4174>steep<s%> place.

For the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> and for the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H4310>What<s%> is the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob?<s%> is it not <S%H8111>Samaria?<s%> and <S%H4310>what<s%> are the <S%H1116>high<s%> places of <S%H3063>Judah?<s%> are they not <S%H3389>Jerusalem?<s%>

Therefore I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> as an <S%H5856>heap<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and as <S%H4302>plantings<s%> of a <S%H3754>vineyard:<s%> and I will <S%H5064>pour<s%> down the <S%H68>stones<s%> thereof into the <S%H1516>valley,<s%> and I will <S%H1540>discover<s%> the <S%H3247>foundations<s%> thereof.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6456>graven<s%> images thereof shall be <S%H3807>beaten<s%> to pieces, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H868>hires<s%> thereof shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6091>idols<s%> thereof will I <S%H7760>lay<s%> <S%H8077>desolate:<s%> for she <S%H6908>gathered<s%> it of the <S%H868>hire<s%> of an <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> and they shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H868>hire<s%> of an <S%H2181>harlot.<s%>

Therefore I will <S%H5594>wail<s%> and <S%H3213>howl,<s%> I will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7758>stripped<s%> and <S%H6174>naked:<s%> I will <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4553>wailing<s%> like the <S%H8577>dragons,<s%> and <S%H60>mourning<s%> as the <S%H1323>owls.<s%> <S%H3284><s%>

For her <S%H4347>wound<s%> is <S%H605>incurable;<s%> for it is <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> he is <S%H5060>come<s%> to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> even to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
<S%H5046>Declare<s%> you it not at <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> <S%H1058>weep<s%> you not at all: in the <S%H1035>house<s%> of <S%H1036>Aphrah<s%> <S%H6428>roll<s%> yourself in the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

<S%H5674>Pass<s%> you away, you <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H8208>Saphir,<s%> having your <S%H1322>shame<s%> <S%H6181>naked:<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6630>Zaanan<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> not <S%H3318>forth<s%> in the <S%H4553>mourning<s%> of <S%H1018>Bethezel;<s%> he shall <S%H3947>receive<s%> of you his <S%H5979>standing.<s%>

For the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H4796>Maroth<s%> <S%H2342>waited<s%> <S%H2470>carefully<s%> for <S%H2896>good:<s%> but <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

O you <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> <S%H7573>bind<s%> the <S%H4818>chariot<s%> to the <S%H7409>swift<s%> <S%H7409>beast:<s%> she is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> to the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> for the <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H4672>found<s%> in you.

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> shall you <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7964>presents<s%> to <S%H4182>Moreshethgath:<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H392>Achzib<s%> shall be a <S%H391>lie<s%> to the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H5750>Yet<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> an <S%H3423>heir<s%> to you, O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H4762>Mareshah:<s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5725>Adullam<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Make you <S%H7139>bald,<s%> and <S%H1494>poll<s%> you for your <S%H8588>delicate<s%> <S%H1121>children;<s%> <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> your <S%H7144>baldness<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle;<s%> for they are gone into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> from you.
